track.name: Goodbye My Lover
comments: Probably the most beautiful song ever written!
...you have been the One for me...
Damn...I don't normally listen to this type of music, but this song has made me feel more than any other. Simply beautiful.
ik pikir ini lagoe soenggoeh tiada pantes dibikin oemoem. ini satoe lagoe jang bole dikataken mengandoeng  itoe ratjoen pikiran. soenggoeh penjanji jang kedji hatinja.
I fell in love in Malta once and this song always reminds me of that time.
immer, wenn ich das Lied höre, denke ich nur an dich
tin kardia mou kai tin psychi mou pige mazi sas !!
Just feel like my heart will burn everytime I listen this song.
God I love this sad singing sheep.
Every time I listen to this song I realize I wouldn't give up the heartache I feel over my lost love for the chance to never have had it happen at all. Such sweet suffering
If you've ever had your heart broken this song pretty much sums it up.  Beautiful song
I watched James Blunt singing this song live. So heartfelt.
